title: A couple of T206s for sale...
author: Marty

posts.post_title: A couple of T206s for sale...
posts.post_content:
Anyone interested?  Each card has been graded by PSA.  The format for each card is:  name of player, variation (if any), back, subject series, factory, PSA grade, and price.
